actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Slam attack and two Shortsword attacks or it makes two Thorn Shot attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d6+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage and target: DC 15 Con save. On failure target takes 14 (4d6) poison and is poisoned 1 min. On success target takes half damage and isn't poisoned. Poisoned target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Thorn Shot
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit 30/120' one target 10 (2d4+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

reactions.name: Spore Cloud
reactions.desc: When it takes damage from a ranged attack emits a burst of thick yellow spores that surround infested duelist and heavily obscure area within 5 ft. of it. Spores dissipate at start of duelist's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If subject to effect that allows Dex save for half damage takes no damage on success and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Parasite Sense
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. poisoned creatures.

special_abilities.name: Plant-Powered Mobility
special_abilities.desc: Opportunity attacks made vs. duelist have disadvantage. If the duelist is prone at the start of its turn it can immediately stand with o costing movement.
